src_original: bodhisatvo dāyakena dānapatinā vā lābhena pravāryamāṇo vā câlpêcchatāṃ darśayati /  citte na spṛhām utpādayati /
tgt_original: 「如是菩薩不著俗事，即得淨命，無偽威儀欺詐語意，謂施主前終不偽現，安庠徐步視前六肘，不顧左右邪命威儀，無施主時即便縱誕； 又對施主不為利養，出順彼意細語美言，無施主時語便麁鄙； 見他行施心實起貪，而言不須，不得便惱；

src_original: antardāhâiṣa kulaputra yad vācâlpêcchatā cittena lābhakāmatā /
evaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kuhanalapanalābhâpagato bhavati / pe /  na bodhisatvo dānapatiṃ vā dṛṣṭvā nimittaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 「是諸菩薩無如是等求利之相，若見施主終不發言：

src_original: vighāto me cīvareṇa /  vighāto me pātreṇa /  vighāto me glānabhaiṣajyena /
tgt_original: 『三衣弊壞，什物闕少，或須醫藥。

src_original: na ca taṃ dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ vā kiṃcit prārthayate /  na vācaṃ niścārayati /  evaṃ hi bodhisatvo nimittalābhâpagato bhavati /  yāvan na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvâivaṃ vācaṃ niścārayati /  amukenâmu-  [ Cambridge MS f117b ---> ]

kena vā me dānapatinâmukaṃ vastu pratipāditaṃ tasya ca mayâmukôpakāraḥ kṛtaḥ /  tena me śīlavān ayam iti kṛtvêdaṃ cêdaṃ ca dattaṃ bahuśrutêti /  mayā ca tasya kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya parigṛhītaṃ /  pe //
tgt_original: 『某甲施主施我此物，彼人謂我持戒、多聞、大悲心淨，雖爾讚歎我無此德，唯勤修善報施主恩。

src_original: tatra kāyakṣatir yad uta lābhahetor lābhanidānam ādhāvanaparidhāvanaṃ dauḥśīlyasamudācaraṇaṃ ca /  cittakṣatir yad uta prārthanā /  lābhināṃ ca brahmacāriṇām antike vyāpādabahulatā /  evaṃ hi bodhisatvo viṣamaparyeṣṭilābhâpagato bhavati /  pe //
tgt_original: 』「是諸菩薩不對白衣自讚毀他而求名利，見施餘人不生瞋惱，終不諂曲而以取財，不詐親善害他取物，不希他辱戲弄取財。

src_original: iha bodhisatvo na tulākūṭena na mānakūṭena na visraṃbhaghātikayā na dhūrtatayā lābham upārjayati /  evaṃ hi bodhisatvo 'dharmalābhâpagato bhavati / pe /  ye te lābhā staupikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā dhārmikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā sāṃghikasaṃsṛṣṭā vâdattā vânanujñātā vā /  tān na pratīcchati na svīkaroti /  evaṃ hi bodhisatvo 'pariśuddhalābhâpagato bhavati /
tgt_original: 施主擬施若所讚人、或說法者、或復大眾，或未別擬，或施未決，菩薩終不入中取分。

src_original: yāval labdhā lābhaṃ na mamāyate /  na dhanāyate /  na saṃnidhiṃ karoti /  kālânukālaṃ ca śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dadāti /  mātāpitṛmitrâmātyajñātisālohitebhyaḥ kālânukālam ātmanā paribhuṅkte paribhuñjānaś câraktaḥ paribhuṅkte /  na paritapyati na ca dāyakadānapatīnām antike 'prasādacittam utpādayatîty ādi //
